mapper.insert: INSERT INTO study ( study_no, email, study_name, study_hashtag, study_thumbnail, study_start_date, study_end_date, study_reg_date, current_member, max_member, selfstudy_rule, selfstudy_password, groupstudy_info, groupstudy_plan, groupstudy_condition, recruitment_start_date, recruitment_end_date, study_end_flag, studyroom_grade, study_type, study_interest) VALUES ( seq_study_no.NEXTVAL, #{studyMaker.email}, #{studyName}, #{studyHashtag:VARCHAR}, #{studyThumbnail:VARCHAR}, #{studyStartDate}, #{studyEndDate}, SYSDATE, #{currentMember}, #{maxMember:NUMERIC}, #{selfStudyRule:VARCHAR}, #{selfStudyPassword:VARCHAR}, #{groupStudyInfo:VARCHAR}, #{groupStudyPlan:VARCHAR}, #{groupStudyCondition:VARCHAR}, #{recruitmentStartDate:DATE}, #{recruitmentEndDate:DATE}, '1', #{studyRoomGrade}, #{studyType}, #{studyInterest} )

INSERT INTO groupstudy_member ( groupstudy_member_no, study_no, email, studyrole, participation_reason, determination, approval_flag ) VALUES ( seq_groupstudy_member_no.NEXTVAL, #{study.studyNo}, #{member.email}, #{studyRole:VARCHAR}, #{participationReason:VARCHAR}, #{determination:VARCHAR}, #{approvalFlag:VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT study_no, email, study_name, study_hashtag, study_thumbnail, TO_CHAR(study_start_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') study_start_date, TO_CHAR(study_end_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') study_end_date, current_member, max_member, selfstudy_rule, selfstudy_password, groupstudy_info, groupstudy_plan, groupstudy_condition, TO_CHAR(recruitment_start_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') recruitment_start_date, TO_CHAR(recruitment_end_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') recruitment_end_date, studyroom_grade, study_type, study_interest, groupstudy_notice FROM study WHERE study_no = #{value}

SELECT outer_table.* FROM ( SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT study_no, email, study_name, study_hashtag, study_thumbnail, TO_CHAR(study_start_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') study_start_date, TO_CHAR(study_end_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') study_end_date, current_member, max_member, selfstudy_password, TO_CHAR(recruitment_start_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') recruitment_start_date, TO_CHAR(recruitment_end_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') recruitment_end_date, studyroom_grade, study_type, study_interest FROM study
AND study_end_date >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND study_end_date < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND study_type = 'self'
AND study_type = 'group'
AND study_interest = '독서'
AND study_interest = '어학'
AND study_interest = '임용'
AND study_interest = '취업'
AND study_interest = '공무원'
AND study_interest = '자격증'
AND study_interest = '자기계발'
AND study_interest = '기타공부'
AND (study_name LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' OR study_hashtag LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%')
ORDER BY studyroom_grade DESC
, study_no ASC
, current_member DESC
, current_member ASC
, study_no DESC
) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum}) outer_table WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT study_no, email, study_name, study_hashtag, study_thumbnail, TO_CHAR(study_start_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') study_start_date, TO_CHAR(study_end_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') study_end_date, current_member, max_member, selfstudy_password, TO_CHAR(recruitment_start_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') recruitment_start_date, TO_CHAR(recruitment_end_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') recruitment_end_date, studyroom_grade, study_type, study_interest FROM study
study_end_flag = '1'
study_end_flag = '2'
AND study_type = 'group' AND study_no IN (SELECT study_no FROM groupstudy_member WHERE email = #{email}
AND approval_flag IS NULL

)
